item.title: Banks Start to Bring Boots’ $4.25 Billion Buyout Debt to Market
item.description: Banks are looking to sell $2.25 billion of term loans and $2 billion equivalent of bonds for Boots, to help finance its acquisition by US private equity firm Sycamore Partners, according to people fam
